text: Azula is a fictional character in Nickelodeon's animated television series Avatar: The Last Airbender. The character and series were created by Michael Dante DiMartino and Bryan Konietzko. Azula is voiced by Grey DeLisle and will be played by Elizabeth Yu in the Netflix live-action television remake. Her family is her mother Ursa, her father Ozai, her uncle Iroh, and her brother Zuko. ==References== Category:Animated characters Category:Characters of Avatar: The Last Airbender Category:Fictional characters introduced in 2005
title: Azula
